column4: if anyone knows where a GOOD network ubuntu to windoz tutorial is I would love you forever
network? basic network connectivity should work out of the box.. or you want to ask about some specific service?
basic does not work
how do I change what domain my ubuntu is on ?
the lights on the network cards light up? the network cards are recognized in both windows and ubuntu? you can set a fixed ip and ping back and forth?
I have dchp ,but it is a lifetime lease on each machine ,would that matter if the ip's do not change ?
I want to put files and take off files from my ubuntu and a windoz
the windows being the one I am acessing
ah.. you're asking about sharing files.. that would be "samba"
!samba | DJNoMaD
I installed a samba package
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/SettingUpSamba
swat ...no had no clue what it is
so I need to get swat ?
SWAT is a web-gui for setting up samba... it's just an alternative to editing the config files manually
I get the error "cannot mount windows share"
but read the links that ubottu gave you.. lots of good info there
I need to get swat then I need gui lol
!samba > DJNoMaD
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/SettingUpSamba
I read that one and failed horribly lol
then you need to tell us what you tried.. what the results were and so on..
